BUG_ID-0001.description: UI card for Component Popovers contains a typo: 'compnoent' should be 'component'.

BUG_ID-0002.description: After submitting the Block form, the form's class attribute does not include 'ng-submitted' as expected. This prevents validation of form submission state in automated tests.

BUG_ID-0003.description: X axis carries the same color of the graph - clicking the legend buttons should make the x axis disappear along with the graph line, but it remains visible.
